org.jpws.pwslib.data

Interface PwsRawFieldWriter


  • public interface PwsRawFieldWriter
    Interface defining a device designed to write objects of type PwsRawField to an encrypted output stream. This writer organises the appropriate block stream of the cipher depending on previously defined file parameters.

    Closing the writer is possible to avoid further use, but does not close the underlying data stream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this writer and flushes data.
      int getBlockSize()
      The blocksize of the underlying encryption cipher.
      int getCount()
      The number of written blocks in the underlying output stream.
      int getFormat()
      The file format version for which this writer was defined.
      void writeRawField(PwsRawField rawField)
      Writes a single raw field to the underlying (encrypted) output stream.
